H0.text: Wanlockhead is the highest village in which European country. Scotland

H1.text: Wanlockhead is the highest village in which European country. England

H2.text: Wanlockhead is the highest village in which European country. Wales

H3.text: Wanlockhead is the highest village in which European country. H-Alba

A4.text: It is Scotland's highest village, the village centre being at an elevation of around 405 m (1,329 ft) above sea level.
